channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Saudi investment chief warns: Global business needs cooperation, not protectionism
item.description: “In my view, no nation or company can achieve resilience [in] isolation,” said H.E. Khalid A. Al-Falih.

item.title: Thinking About Launching Your Next Company? 2 Founders Share Their Tips for Serial Entrepreneurship
item.description: Seth Goldman and Craig Dubitsky opened up their playbooks for brand-building at the Inc. 5000 Conference.

item.title: AIG to acquire the majority of renewal rights to Everest Group’s global retail insurance portfolio in $2 billion deal
item.description: The acquisition gives AIG access to future business without inheriting responsibility for claims and obligations predating the deal.

item.title: The Twitter domain is officially being retired. Here’s what to do to make sure your account doesn’t get locked

item.title: Candy inflation has spooked so many consumers almost 80% say they’re forced to scale back how much to buy for Halloween
item.description: Of the 6,000+ shoppers surveyed, 83% said they’re capping their candy spending at $100.

item.title: America is building two AMD-powered supercomputers to re-create the sun and fight disease

item.title: Inclusion Isn’t a Nice-to-Have, But a Must-Have Innovation Strategy
item.description: The smartest path to growth isn’t building in isolation but through inclusion.

item.title: The FOMO-fueled gold bubble may now be turning into a ‘mini-bust,’ analysts say
item.description: "The latest leg of the gold rally looks like a market bubble that is in its final stages."

item.title: Walmart, Best Buy roll out Black Friday 2025 calendar: Deals start this week. Here’s what to know

item.title: Open-source AI is ‘China’s game right now’—and that’s a problem for the U.S. and its allies, Andreessen Horowitz partner says
item.description: Andreessen Horowitz partner Anjney Midha says China is leading in open-source AI, driven by startups like DeepSeek, while the U.S. is playing catch-up...

item.title: OpenAI is Reportedly Developing a Music Tool. Here’s How It Could Enhance Your Marketing Strategy.
item.description: The generative music product is set to join a growing network of AI tools in the creative space.

item.title: Leaders from Box, Meta, and LinkedIn on how AI is reshaping the future of work
item.description: AI is radically changing the future of the workplace—from redefining jobs to fueling the rise of so-called “workslop.” Live onstage at the Masters of ...

item.title: Ryan Holiday’s 3 Books Every Entrepreneur Must Read
item.description: The best-selling author behind the Daily Stoic shares his essential books for founders.

item.title: The Passive Job Seeker’s Guide to LinkedIn
